title: ICAI Extends Peer Review Mandate Phase IV Applicability to December 31, 2026
content:
# ICAI Extends Peer Review Mandate Phase IV Applicability to December 31, 2026

Ek important update hai for all Practice Units! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne Peer Review Mandate ke Phase IV ki applicability date extend kar di hai.

*   **Old Applicability Date:** Phase IV was initially slated to become mandatory from January 1, 2026.
*   **New Applicability Date:** Ab yeh mandate December 31, 2026, se compulsory hoga.
*   **Announcement Date:** This extension was officially announced by the ICAI on December 31, 2025.

This deferment provides Practice Units with crucial additional time to obtain the Peer Review Certificate, which is a prerequisite for undertaking specific audits and services. Specifically, Phase IV covers Practice Units that propose to undertake audits of branches of Public Sector Banks, and Practice Units rendering attestation services having three or more partners.
